IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: OPERATES FOR THE BENEFIT AND SUPPORT OF AMATEUR SKIING AND SNOWBOARDING, INCLUDING COACHING AND TRAINING ATHLETES IN THESE SPORTS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: OPERATES FOR THE BENEFIT AND SUPPORT OF AMATEUR SKIING AND SNOWBOARDING, INCLUDING COACHING AND TRAINING ATHLETES IN THESE SPORTS.
IRS990.Description: UNITED STATES SKI TEAM - TO PROVIDE FUNDING FOR THE TRAINING, COACHING, AND COMPETITION COSTS OF U.S. SKI AND SNOWBOARD TEAM ATHLETES AND DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMS FOR ATHLETES ASPIRING TO MAKE THE U.S. SKI AND SNOWBOARD TEAMS.

Activity2.Description: SCHOLARSHIP PROGRAM - A RESTRICTED DONATION WAS USED TO ESTABLISH A SCHOLARSHIP FUND FOR ATHLETES. DURING THE PAST YEAR 26 SCHOLARSHIPS WERE AWARDED.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION HAS ADOPTED THE FIN 48 STANDARD. HOWEVER, MANAGEMENT BELIEVES THEY DO NOT HAVE ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. THEREFORE, NO DISCLOSURES HAVE BEEN MADE TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
SCHEDULE D, PART XII, LINE 4B AND SCHEDULE D, PART XIII, LINE 4B: THE AMOUNTS REPORTED REPRESENT FUNDRAISING EXPENSES SHOWN ON 990, PAGE 9, PART VIII, LINE 8B.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: ALL GRANT FUNDS ARE ISSUED TO THE UNITED STATES SKI TEAM TO FUND ATHLETIC PROGRAMS AND SCHOLARSHIPS TO OUTSTANDING ATHLETES TO ASSIST WITH SCHOOL EXPENSES. ON A MONTHLY BASIS MANAGEMENT MONITORS BUDGETS AND SPENDING TO ENSURE THE FUNDS ARE BEING USED APPROPRIATELY.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS DELEGATED THE REVIEW OF THE FORM 990 TO THE MANAGEMENT GROUP. THE ORGANIZATION'S CFO AND CONTROLLER WORK CLOSELY WITH THE OUTSIDE ACCOUNTING FIRM ENGAGED TO PREPARE THE RETURN. THE FINAL FORM 990 IS ALSO REVIEWED BY THE MANAGEMENT GROUP PRIOR TO BEING PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE IS CHARGED WITH MONITORING PROPOSED OR ONGOING TRANSACTIONS FOR CONFLICTS OF INTEREST AND ADDRESSING ANY POTENTIAL OR ACTUAL CONFLICTS. PURSUANT TO THE CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY, AN ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST QUESTIONAIRE, AIMED AT DETERMINING ANY FAMILY AND BUSINESS RELATIONSHIPS AND TRANSACTIONS OR OTHER TRANSACTIONS THAT MAY POSE A POTENTIAL CONFLICT, IS DISTRIBUTED TO ALL COVERED PERSONS. THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS REVIEWED AND SIGNED EACH YEAR BY ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD, MANAGEMENT AND EMPLOYEES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL COMPENSATION IS PAID THROUGH A RELATED PARTY, THE UNITED STATES SKI ASSOCIATION. THE BOARD OF USSA APPOINTS A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE, COMPRISED SOLELY OF INDEPENDENT DIRECTORS, NONE OF WHICH HAVE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST WITH RESPECT TO THE COMPENSATION ARRANGEMENT, TO BE ACCOUNTABLE FOR SETTING REASONABLE COMPENSATION PACKAGES FOR EACH OFFICER AND EMPLOYEE. THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE COMPENSATION EACH YEAR AND A COMPENSATION STUDY IS PERFORMED AS NEEDED. THE MOST RECENT COMPENSATION STUDY UPDATE WAS MADE IN 2008.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION UPON REQUEST. THESE DOCUMENTS ARE ALSO AVAILABLE FOR INSPECTION FROM THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE.

ALL COMPENSATION IS PAID THROUGH A RELATED PARTY, THE UNITED STATES SKI ASSOCIATION. THE TOTAL COMPENSATION IS THEN ALLOCATED TO THE VARIOUS ENTITIES BASED UPON THE PERCENT OF TIME THE OFFICERS SPEND ON EACH OF THE ENTITIES. THE FOLLOWING SCHEDULE SUMMARIZES THE AVERAGE HOURS PER WEEK SPENT ON OTHER RELATED ORGANIZATIONS. HOURS PER WEEK UNITED STATES SKI ASSOCIATION WILLIAM MAROLT, CEO 15 RICHARD COE, COO 18 MARK LAMPE, CFO 17 UNITED STATES SKI TEAM INC WILLIAM MAROLT, CEO 15 RICHARD COE, COO 18 MARK LAMPE, CFO 17 USSA ENTERPRISES WILLIAM MAROLT, CEO 1 RICHARD COE, COO 1 MARK LAMPE, CFO 1 UNITED STATES SKIING FOUNDATION WILLIAM MAROLT, CEO 1 RICHARD COE, COO 1 MARK LAMPE, CFO 1
